Projects

Data Analyst Job Findings

  • Pandas
  • Matplotlib
  • Seaborn

Using a dataset of LinkedIn EU job postings (2023), I explored entry-level Data Analyst roles to uncover trends in the most in-demand tools and programming languages. This project highlights how real job market data can guide career development and targeted learning for aspiring data professionals.
